content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'gold_adlslambda_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [gold_adlslambda_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://gold@adlslambda.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [Fact].[Churn] (
	[CustomerId] int,
	[Surname] nvarchar(50),
	[CreditScore] int,
	[Country] nvarchar(50),
	[Gender] nvarchar(10),
	[Age] int,
	[Tenure] int,
	[Balance] float,
	[NumOfProducts] int,
	[HasCreditCard] int,
	[ActiveMember] int,
	[EstimatedSalary] float,
	[Exited] int,
	[sk_geo] int,
	[sk_age] int,
	[sk_gender] int,
	[sk_surname] int
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Fato/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [gold_adlslambda_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [Fact].[Churn]
GO
